definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: Cement clinker of green colour can be obtained by using chromium oxide am a colorant.
sentences.chinese: 以氧化铬作为着色剂，可以烧成绿色水泥熟料。

sentences.english: Enables tinting the background that shows through in transparent mode.
sentences.chinese: 在透明模式下，对显示的背景进行着色。

sentences.english: Treated with paint, stains, creosote or other preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 用油漆，着色剂，杂酚油或其他防腐剂处理。

sentences.english: The crossHatch shader actually does two separate things.
sentences.chinese: 交叉阴影着色网络实际上做了两样事。

sentences.english: In this paper a estimate of the harmonious chromatic number of a complete 5-ary tree was given.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了五元完全树的调和着色数的比较好的估计。

sentences.english: High temperature was unfavorable to accumulate anthocyanin.
sentences.chinese: 温度高不利于色稻颖果着色。

sentences.english: Mild mutations in XPF cause the cancer - prone syndrome xeroderma pigmentosum.
sentences.chinese: XPF轻微突变导致致癌倾向综合征着色性干皮病。

sentences.english: You can create your vertex shader in two ways (that I know).
sentences.chinese: 创建顶点着色程序你可有两种方法。

sentences.english: The picture was cleverly restored and showed up its original colouring.
sentences.chinese: 孩子在给一套素描画着色。

sentences.english: Lignin staining showed an increase in lignification in culms of the overexpressor lines.
sentences.chinese: 木质素着色表明过表达株系茎部木质化增加。

sentences.english: Sets a custom color when re-colorizing the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 设定一种用于对眼睛重新着色的自定义颜色。

sentences.english: Process of making lustre glaze by metal oxide as colouring agent was narrated.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了以金属氧化物为着色剂的虹彩釉的制作过程。

sentences.english: You can add new shaders and tweak them.
sentences.chinese: 你可以添加新的着色器并进行调节。

sentences.english: Provided logo should be recolored to some kind of red.
sentences.chinese: 所提供的标识应当重新着色某些种类的红色。

sentences.english: I was also splotchy with where I added the color.
sentences.chinese: 我同样给着色的地方添加了一下斑点。

sentences.english: Apparently, they consume metal-based colorants on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 显然，它们消耗表面的以金属为基础的着色剂。

definition: to color (a picture etc)/to dye (fabric etc)/to stain (furniture etc)
shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)
to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
to make a draft/to draft (a document)
color printing using several overlaid images
relief shading (in a picture)/fig. to throw into relief
to apply paint, veneer etc/to plaster over/decorative coating/finish/veneer
